item.name: activate_module
item.message:
The module "%s" is disabled, whereby certain features can be limited.
Please enable the module, to resolve this problem.

item.name: confirm_delete
item.message: Do you really want to delete the marked entries?

item.name: create_error
item.message: While creating the entry an error has occured.

item.name: create_success
item.message: The entry has been created successfully.

item.name: date_description
item.message: If you wouldn\'t like to set a enddate, just set the release date and the end date to the same values.

item.name: daylight_saving_time
item.message: Daylight saving time is in effect

item.name: delete_error
item.message: While deleting the marked entries an error has occured.

item.name: delete_success
item.message: The marked entries have been deleted successfully.

item.name: edit_error
item.message: While editing the entry an error has occured.

item.name: edit_success
item.message: The entry has been edited successfully.

item.name: entry_not_found
item.message: Sorry, but the requested entry can be found.

item.name: flood_no_entry_possible
item.message: You need to wait %d seconds, to submit a new comment

item.name: message_to_short
item.message: The message should be a least 3 characters long

item.name: move_impossible
item.message: It\'s impossible to move this element

item.name: no_entries_selected
item.message: Please select the entries that should be deleted.

item.name: order_error
item.message: While editing the order, an error has occured.

item.name: order_success
item.message: The order has been edited successfully.

item.name: select_date
item.message: Please complete the statements belonging the release date and end date

item.name: select_date_format
item.message: Please select, wether you want to display the date in short or long format

item.name: select_daylight_saving_time
item.message: Please select, wether daylight saving time is in effect or not

item.name: settings_error
item.message: While editing the settings an error has occured.

item.name: settings_success
item.message: The settings have been edited successfully.

item.name: upload_error
item.message: While moving the file %s an error has occured.

item.name: wrong_email_format
item.message: The E-mail address doesn\'t match the format name@domain.tld
